yawning_titan.config.agents.red_agent_config.RedAgentConfig

class yawning_titan.config.agents.red_agent_config.RedAgentConfig(_red_skill: float, _red_uses_skill: bool, _red_ignores_defences: bool, _red_always_succeeds: bool, _red_can_only_attack_from_red_agent_node: bool, _red_can_attack_from_any_red_node: bool, _red_can_naturally_spread: bool, _chance_to_spread_to_connected_node: float, _chance_to_spread_to_unconnected_node: float, _red_uses_spread_action: bool, _spread_action_likelihood: float, _chance_for_red_to_spread: float, _red_uses_random_infect_action: bool, _random_infect_action_likelihood: float, _chance_for_red_to_random_compromise: float, _red_uses_basic_attack_action: bool, _basic_attack_action_likelihood: float, _red_uses_do_nothing_action: bool, _do_nothing_action_likelihood: float, _red_uses_move_action: bool, _move_action_likelihood: float, _red_uses_zero_day_action: bool, _zero_day_start_amount: int, _days_required_for_zero_day: int, _red_chooses_target_at_random: bool, _red_target_node: str, _red_prioritises_connected_nodes: bool, _red_prioritises_un_connected_nodes: bool, _red_prioritises_vulnerable_nodes: bool, _red_prioritises_resilient_nodes: bool, _red_always_chooses_shortest_distance_to_target: bool)[source]

Bases: ConfigABC

Class that validates and stores the Red Agent Configuration.

Methods

create

Creates an instance of :class:`RedAgentConfig <yawning_titan.config.agents.red_agent_config.RedAgentConfig>.

to_dict

Serializes a ConfigABC as a dict.

validate

Validates the red agent config dict.

Attributes

basic_attack_action_likelihood

Weighting for red_uses_basic_attack_action.

chance_for_red_to_random_compromise

Chance for each 'infect' to succeed.

Chance for each 'spread' to succeed.

Chance to spread to connected node.

chance_to_spread_to_unconnected_node

Chance to spread to unconnected node.

The amount of 'progress' that need to have passed before the red agent gains a zero day attack.

Chance for red_uses_do_nothing_action.

Chance of red_uses_move_action.

random_infect_action_likelihood

Weighting for red_uses_random_infect_action.

red_always_chooses_shortest_distance_to_target

Red always chooses the absolute shortest distance to target with no randomisation.

red_always_succeeds

Reds attacks always succeed.

red_can_attack_from_any_red_node

Red can attack from any node.

red_can_naturally_spread

The red agent naturally spreads its influence every time-step.

red_can_only_attack_from_red_agent_node

Red can only attack from red agent node.

red_chooses_target_at_random

Red picks nodes to attack at random.

red_ignores_defences

The red agent ignores the defences of nodes.

red_prioritises_connected_nodes

Red sorts the nodes it can attack and chooses the one that has the most connections.

red_prioritises_resilient_nodes

Red sorts the nodes is can attack and chooses the one that is the least vulnerable.

red_prioritises_un_connected_nodes

Red sorts the nodes it can attack and chooses the one that has the least connections.

red_prioritises_vulnerable_nodes

Red sorts the nodes is can attack and chooses the one that is the most vulnerable.

red_skill

Red Skill.

red_target_node

Red targets a specific node.

red_uses_basic_attack_action

Red uses basic attack action.

red_uses_do_nothing_action

The red agent does nothing.

red_uses_move_action

The red agent moves to a different node.

red_uses_random_infect_action

Tries to infect every safe node in the environment.

red_uses_skill

Red uses its skill modifier when attacking nodes.

red_uses_spread_action

Tries to spread to every node connected to an infected node.

red_uses_zero_day_action

Red uses zero day action.

spread_action_likelihood

Weighting for red_uses_spread_action.

zero_day_start_amount

The number of zero-day attacks that the red agent starts with.
property red_skill: float

Red Skill.

The red agents skill level. Higher means that red is more likely to succeed in attacks.

property red_uses_skill: bool

Red uses its skill modifier when attacking nodes.

property red_ignores_defences: bool

The red agent ignores the defences of nodes.

to_dict() → Dict

Serializes a ConfigABC as a dict.

As instances of ConfigABC are dataclasses, the default __dict__ method is used to access the attributes. The private key name of each attribute has its underscore prefix removed before the key and value is added to a dict and returned.

Returns

The ConfigABC as a dict.

property red_always_succeeds: bool

Reds attacks always succeed.

property red_can_only_attack_from_red_agent_node: bool

Red can only attack from red agent node.

The red agent will only ever be in one node however it can control any amount of nodes. Can the red agent only attack from its one main node or can it attack from any node that it controls.

property red_can_attack_from_any_red_node: bool

Red can attack from any node.

The red agent will only ever be in one node however it can control any amount of nodes. Can the red agent only attack from its one main node or can it attack from any node that it controls.

property red_can_naturally_spread: bool

The red agent naturally spreads its influence every time-step.

property chance_to_spread_to_connected_node: float

Chance to spread to connected node.

If a node is connected to a compromised node what chance does it have to become compromised every turn through natural spreading.

property chance_to_spread_to_unconnected_node: float

Chance to spread to unconnected node.

If a node is not connected to a compromised node what chance does it have to become randomly infected through natural spreading.

property red_uses_spread_action: bool

Tries to spread to every node connected to an infected node.

property spread_action_likelihood: float

Weighting for red_uses_spread_action.

property chance_for_red_to_spread: float

Chance for each ‘spread’ to succeed.

property red_uses_random_infect_action: bool

Tries to infect every safe node in the environment.

property random_infect_action_likelihood: float

Weighting for red_uses_random_infect_action.

property chance_for_red_to_random_compromise: float

Chance for each ‘infect’ to succeed.

property red_uses_basic_attack_action: bool

Red uses basic attack action.

The red agent picks a single node connected to an infected node and tries to attack and take over that node.

property basic_attack_action_likelihood: float

Weighting for red_uses_basic_attack_action.

property red_uses_do_nothing_action: bool

The red agent does nothing.

property do_nothing_action_likelihood: float

Chance for red_uses_do_nothing_action.

property red_uses_move_action: bool

The red agent moves to a different node.

property move_action_likelihood: float

Chance of red_uses_move_action.

property red_uses_zero_day_action: bool

Red uses zero day action.

The red agent will pick a safe node connected to an infected node and take it over with a 100% chance to succeed (can only happen every n timesteps).

property zero_day_start_amount: float

The number of zero-day attacks that the red agent starts with.

property days_required_for_zero_day: int

The amount of ‘progress’ that need to have passed before the red agent gains a zero day attack.

property red_chooses_target_at_random: bool

Red picks nodes to attack at random.

property red_target_node: str

Red targets a specific node.

property red_prioritises_connected_nodes: bool

Red sorts the nodes it can attack and chooses the one that has the most connections.

property red_prioritises_un_connected_nodes: bool

Red sorts the nodes it can attack and chooses the one that has the least connections.

property red_prioritises_vulnerable_nodes: bool

Red sorts the nodes is can attack and chooses the one that is the most vulnerable.

property red_prioritises_resilient_nodes: bool

Red sorts the nodes is can attack and chooses the one that is the least vulnerable.

property red_always_chooses_shortest_distance_to_target: bool

Red always chooses the absolute shortest distance to target with no randomisation.

classmethod create(config_dict: Dict[str, Any]) → RedAgentConfig[source]

Creates an instance of :class:`RedAgentConfig <yawning_titan.config.agents.red_agent_config.RedAgentConfig>.
